DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy individual 2 . Age 1845 year 3 . Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 24.9 1 . Diabetes mellitus 2 . Chronic drug treatment medical condition like hypertension hyperlipidemia , hyperthyroidism take weight control medication . 3 . Inability give inform consent . 4 . Inability give contact information include permanent residence provide evidence stable living environment study period . 5 . Active weight reduction 7 pound last 3 month . 6 . History bleed blood clot disorder . 7 . Pregnancy breastfeed woman . 8 . History anaphylaxis anaphylactoidlike reaction result food allergy . 9 . HIV hepatitis B C positive subject . 10 . Subjects hemoglobin < 8.5 gm/dl . 11 . Abnormal liver function test ( ALT , AST , alkaline phosphate , LDH , GGT total bilirubin ) . 12 . Serum creatinine BUN great upper limit normal , serum albumin less 3.5g/dl , proteinuria 1+ great . 13 . History alcohol intake 40 g/day . 14 . Contraindications magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) include pacemaker , surgical clip , metallic implant , neuromuscular skeletal stimulators internal orthopedic screw rod .
